SELECT ss.store_clcln_id, ss.store_id, s.store_conm, ss.tot_sel_amt, ss.sel_fee_rt, ss.clcln_amt, ss.clcln_prcs_ymd, ss.clcln_stts_cd FROM store_settlements ss JOIN stores s ON ss.store_id = s.store_id
ORDER BY ss.clcln_prcs_ymd DESC, ss.store_clcln_id DESC LIMIT #{pageSize} OFFSET #{offset}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM store_settlements ss JOIN stores s ON ss.store_id = s.store_id
SELECT store_id FROM stores WHERE seller_user_no = #{userNo} LIMIT 1

SELECT oi.ordr_dtl_artcl_no AS orderItemId, o.ordr_no AS orderId, o.ordr_dt AS orderDate, p.gds_no AS productId, p.gds_nm AS productName, oi.ordr_qntty AS quantity, oi.ordr_tm_untprc AS unitPrice, (oi.ordr_qntty * oi.ordr_tm_untprc) AS totalAmount FROM order_items AS oi JOIN orders AS o ON oi.ordr_no = o.ordr_no LEFT JOIN products AS p ON oi.gds_no = p.gds_no WHERE oi.store_id = #{storeId} ORDER BY o.ordr_dt DESC

SELECT oi.ordr_dtl_artcl_no AS orderItemId, o.ordr_no AS orderId, o.ordr_dt AS orderDate, p.gds_no AS productId, p.gds_nm AS productName, oi.ordr_qntty AS quantity, oi.ordr_tm_untprc AS unitPrice, (oi.ordr_qntty * oi.ordr_tm_untprc) AS totalAmount, s.store_conm AS storeName -- 상점명도 함께 조회 FROM order_items AS oi JOIN orders AS o ON oi.ordr_no = o.ordr_no LEFT JOIN products AS p ON oi.gds_no = p.gds_no LEFT JOIN stores AS s ON oi.store_id = s.store_id WHERE o.ordr_stts_cd IN ('결제완료', '배송준비중', '배송중', '배송완료', '구매확정') ORDER BY o.ordr_dt DESC
